example.eg: Richard needed to make a few modifications to his essay.

trans_examp.trans_cn: （一处）修改, 更改, 改进

example.eg: The seamstress did modifications and repair work on clothing.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 修改，改进, 改装，改型

example.eg: The linguist studies verb modification in East Frisian.
Behaviour modification consists of learning new habits.
